resources.string: The base URL of your motion server, including a port if necessary. e.g. just enter http://www.yourmotionserver.com:8000 when the full path to the camera API is http://www.yourmotionserver.com:8000/0/detection/start

An alternative base URL for your motion server. Useful when on the same home network as the motion server, when the external domain name does not resolve correctly. e.g. http://192.168.0.1:8000 This 2nd URL will be used if the 1st is unreachable.
